message: “The proposal, initially put forward by local activists with the Central Massachusetts Freedom Coalition and fine-tuned by the city legal department, would require all hotels in Worcester to train their employees on how to spot and properly report suspected sex trafficking.”

data.description: As activists pressed that time is of the essence, the City Council this week moved a policy proposal to curb sex trafficking in Worcester to public
data.title: Human trafficking hotel policy moves to hearings in Worcester - Worcester Mag
